sentence.Network_en: His language is disjointed and sloppy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的语言支离破碎，混乱不堪。

sentence.Network_en: He is rather disjointed when he ad-libs.
sentence.Network_cn: 他即兴表演时，有些语无伦次。

sentence.Network_en: Sally was used to his disjointed, drunken ramblings.
sentence.Network_cn: 萨莉习惯了他醉酒后毫无逻辑的胡言乱语。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... disjoin v 分开，拆散 disjointed a 脱节的；散乱的 enjoin v 命令，吩咐.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... discontented 不满足的，不满意的 disjointed 脱节的，杂乱的 undaunted 不屈不挠的，无畏的.
2008年1月的SAT真题解析-sat阅读培训-教育联展网 ... tedious 无聊的 disjointed 杂乱无章的 unsettling 扰乱的，使人不安的.
不相等 unlikeness不相联贯 disjointed不相配 inaptness

list.abs: discriminatory analysis 判别分析disjoint elements 不相交元素disjoint relations 不相交关系
disjoint sets 不相交集disjoint sum 不相交并集disjoint union 不相交并集
disjoint relations 不相交关系disjoint sets 不相交集disjoint sum 不相交并集
mutual information 交互mutually disjoint 互不相交的mutually disjoint events 互不相交事件

entry.tran: (文字、思想、想法等)不连贯的，支离破碎的，杂乱无章的
entry.def: Disjointed words, thoughts, or ideas are not presented in a smooth or logical way and are therefore difficult to understand.

example.ex: Sally was used to his disjointed, drunken ramblings.
example.tran: 萨莉习惯了他醉酒后毫无逻辑的胡言乱语。

entry.tran: (社会、体制、活动等)联系松散的，支离破碎的
entry.def: Disjointed societies, systems, and activities are ones in which the different parts or elements are not as closely connected as they should be or as they used to be.

example.tran: 我们日益分裂和支离破碎的社会

sentences.sentence: "a confused dream about the end of the world"

auth_sentence.content: In the fourth carriage a disjointed conversation was carried on.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the fourth carriage a disjointed conversation was carried on.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sorry this is rather disjointed. Cheers, Carlyle.

auth_sentence.content: It's just a fog of disjointed images and events.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's just a fog of disjointed images and events.

stems_affixes.word_buile: adjoin[v.邻接, 毗连]+ing……的→adj.邻接的, 隔壁的
disjoin[v.[使]分开, [使]分离]+t+ed表形容词→分开的
join结合,连接+t→n.接合处,接头;关节adj.联合的,共同的,连接的
join结合,连接+t→n.接合处,接头;关节adj.联合的,共同的,连接的
re反+join结合,连接+der→反过来接→回答
ad再+join结合,连接→再连上→毗连
dis分开+join结合,连接→连接分开
en进入+join结合,连接→进入连接→命令加入

stems_affixes.value_cn: 参加,加入;联合,连接;和……在一起
stems_affixes.word_buile: join结合,连接→v.参加,加入;联合,连接;和……在一起
sub在下面+join结合,连接→在下面接上→增补
